name: Purple Heart
description: Hardcore pixel indie platformer with puzzle elements and history. Can you get to the end?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 80 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse, Gamepad
